website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you like the glass base and larger size, but be prepared for discrepancy in the color.
pros: Clear-colored glass base looks refined and is reminiscent of glass bottles
cons: The 28-inch height may be too tall for small tables
The color of the glass base doesn't exactly match the description

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price.
customer_reviews.text: These lamps were delivered very quickly and in perfect condition. They're not exactly what I was looking for, and the lamps are not perfectly centered on their bases. But for the price and considering the amount of trouble it would be to repackage them I will keep them in till I find something I like better. The lampshades are lovely though,and I just may reuse them when I replace these lamps. All in all I think these are nice lamps for a guestroom, but they look inexpensive and not suited for my master bedroom. I would not have purchased them if I had been able to see them in person prior to purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lamp-color is not as dark as listing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these lamps for my living room. They come well packaged and are beautiful. I really love them, but the color is not navy. It is more of a medium blue with a slight green hue. Had to send them back because they did not work with my navy decor.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: ~STUNNING!!~
customer_reviews.text: These are Gorgeous!! High end appearance at a reasonable price. Also wanted to mention that the drum shades are Large adding an elegance touch. A bit apprehensive since others mentioned that they did not arrive in tact. However they were excellently packed, easy to assemble and look Stunning!! Super Pleased, Cheers, Zoe
customer_reviews.author: ZOE

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality ... a good value.
customer_reviews.text: We are using the lamps in our master bedroom and we really like them. There were a few comments on the website about the color of the glass, so I thought I'd chime in and mention that we ordered the gray glass and it arrived as expect (they are dark gray).
customer_reviews.author: Laurene McE

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lamp, only OK lamp shade
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful lamps, I love the grey glass. Unfortunately both lamp shades were a bit misshapen, and one of them looked like it was put together in a rush (white tape was on the lamp shade but only half covering the metal frame). Might buy new cheap shades to replace but for now it’s OK. All in all I’m pleased with the lamps because I couldn’t find anything similar (grey glass) anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: gorgeous...but please retrain your packing staff!!
customer_reviews.text: I'll start with this: whomever packed them should be fired. there was plenty of space in the box for the shades but they seemed like they were crammed in there by a drunk toddler. one of the shades was slightly dented but I just positioned it in a way that it wasn't super visible. wasn't bad enough to go through the whole return process. that being said, they're absolutely gorgeous. I love the deep cobalt blue glass and the shades (dents aside) are really cool. they're a bit modern which isn't usually my style but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THESE!!
customer_reviews.text: These lamps are fantastic. I bought this set used, and it is perfect. I love this brand and buy from them all the time, and only every have good things to say. The quality and size are great, and they look so clean and classy.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Steele

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lamps
customer_reviews.text: These lamps are just beautiful. They are a very pretty accessory to my living room. The bulbs included are nice bright LED bulbs. I would definitely recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jim D

customer_reviews.title: Pretty color good size
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty in my living room. Blue color is lovely. I have them on a large wall and they are large enough that they present nicely. Easy to assemble, no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: Shades don’t match
customer_reviews.text: I would have given these 5 stars if the shades matched; but the liners are different tones. One is off white and the other is bright white. Since they come in a set they should be identical. And yes, I checked that it wasn’t my bulbs. So now I guess I have to buy two new shades. If it weren’t for that flaw they would be gorgeous and exactly what I wanted. Huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: CWilson

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I was amazingly surprised on how beautiful these were! They do look like designer pieces and go beautifully in my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda L Muller

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The glass on one of the lamps shattered and cracked on its own after 2 years and the manufacturer would not recognize it as a defect and would not replace it. I therefore do not recommend these lamps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE, love, love these! The base of one was a bit off center, but it is not really very noticeable. Have gotten lots of compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gustafson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but needs quality control!
customer_reviews.text: Sadly one lamp is off the base / not centered and one shade was bent.
customer_reviews.author: atlanta

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful lamp design
customer_reviews.text: This blue lamp design looks perfectly crafted & assembled to the finest touch! It lights up real nice with the white bulbs I’ve installed. I don’t think for me there’s any cons about this lamp cuz I love it! I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Louis S.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy These
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed. We loved these lamps when they arrived! One month in, we’re reading in bed... and hear cracking... One of the lamps shattered out of nowhere. So bummed. Really beautiful lamps, just wish they were higher quality (and lasted longer than a month).
customer_reviews.author: Kate Weingartner

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Lamps
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these lamps and I absolutely love them.. they are going to look great in my new living room. I would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: LISA MOORE

customer_reviews.title: GORGEOUS! I LOVE THEM SO HARD!
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect additions to my bedroom I absolutely love them.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsi LeMoine

customer_reviews.title: Greatly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am so upset. I have had these lamps just over a year and one has already shorted out!! These were not cheap lamps and should not already be broke! Now I’m stuck with one lamp that doesn’t work and I refuse to buy a new set, especially since they don’t last!! Greatly disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Dawn D'Amico

customer_reviews.title: 2nd set!! Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful lamps. I liked them so much these are my second set. Have the Blue ones in the Master Bedroom. The shades and hardware are especially nice. Great size. Colors are lovely. The gray is smokey in color. They work well with my beachy decor.
customer_reviews.author: J. Tomaszewski

customer_reviews.title: Good value, very pretty
customer_reviews.text: So far very pleased with this purchase of the clear lamps. Impressive looking lamps. Very well packaged and arrived in good condition but styrofoam was messy to clean up. I'm also having a hard time getting the shades to sit straight.
customer_reviews.author: UpTooLate

customer_reviews.title: Great set of lamps!
customer_reviews.text: Great lamps for room. As others have said, shade once lit looks a little cream colored vs bright white. Good quality for the money.
customer_reviews.author: paco

customer_reviews.title: beautiful lamps packaged to insure no damage
customer_reviews.text: beautiful lamps packaged to insure no damage, the color was grey but glass has a smoking grey and is so much prettier in person
customer_reviews.author: JERRY L HUERTA

customer_reviews.title: One of the Lamps not centered to base!
customer_reviews.text: One of the lamps isn’t centered onto the base at all! I would like one replacement or money off! I have a broken leg and can’t be bothered to send back! And of course tried calling and can’t get a person!😡
customer_reviews.author: kelly dugan

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: These lamps are absolutely gorgeous. I had one broke lamp when I receive them and sending it back and getting a replacement only took a matter of days!
customer_reviews.author: diana forrer

customer_reviews.title: Bought two of these matching lamps for my bedroom...but they don't match!:(
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of these lamps! Unfortunately the glass are different shades of blue. So bummed! Maybe you'll be lucky and get "matching" lights. I have ordered other products from this manufacturer before and been very happy. That's why the three stars.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy H

customer_reviews.title: Nice bit big
customer_reviews.text: Pretty lamps but they were bigger than I was expecting. Bought these to use by my bed and they were way too big.
customer_reviews.author: Trishthedish

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous! Good heavy quality, don't feel too fragile. Exactly what I expected and they look fab!
customer_reviews.author: Baevers29

customer_reviews.title: Lamps are beautiful. They are well made and easy to set ...
customer_reviews.text: Lamps are beautiful. They are well made and easy to set up. I was really worried about them breaking during delivery but they did a great job with the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki C

customer_reviews.title: Statement piece for sure.
customer_reviews.text: Such beautiful color and shape. Really glad to have made this purchse.
customer_reviews.author: Mary H

customer_reviews.title: Simple and elegant
customer_reviews.text: These lamps have a subtle smoky color and go great with my charcoal gray furniture. Price was good and quality great.
customer_reviews.author: jacko

customer_reviews.title: Love this lamp
customer_reviews.text: Such a gorgeous lamp it looks really lovely with my livingroom decor. Look just like the picture
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these lamps but unfortunately one of the tops is ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these lamps but unfortunately one of the tops is broken. I don't know how to ship this back with broken glass.... but would still purchase again/ take a replacement
customer_reviews.author: Riches & Roses

customer_reviews.title: The lamps were the perfect look for the space I bought them for
customer_reviews.text: The lamps were the perfect look for the space I bought them for. However, they are a little unstable (top heavy) and one has already been knocked over and broken.
customer_reviews.author: lisal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect table lamp for living room
customer_reviews.text: These lamps are perfect! They are in our living room. The lamp’s design can go multiple different ways depending on your style. I love the ambience these lamps create.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The packaging was super but both lamps were defective
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was super but both lamps were defective. The blue glass was not glued centered on silver base and was way off. Too much hassle to return.
customer_reviews.author: Lawman

customer_reviews.title: Well-packaged, more beautiful in person
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous set of lamps! Also, was pleasantly surprised that two light bulbs were included.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Geraci

customer_reviews.title: Lamps arrived in perfect condition and they are beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Lamps arrived in perfect condition and they are beautiful. I ordered them in Grey. I would recommend these lamps. Would look great in any room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: These lamps are awesome. They look even better in person. They complete the updates that I have done with my master bedroom perfectly. I am very pleased with this purchase and they came very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these lamps. I bought them for our bedroom and they certainly brighten up the room.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty lamps, but kind of dainty and not very heavy. They look great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: C.D.H.

customer_reviews.title: Great lamps
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! So happy that I purchased them. The quality is superb!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The perfect blue
customer_reviews.text: Love my new lamps! They are the perfect addition to my recently remodeled guest bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: was very happy with the lamps once I figured out which piece went where.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but looks great! check the measurements
customer_reviews.text: a little bit larger then we thought it would be, but looks great! check the measurements.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Navy color is not navy or even cobalt blue
customer_reviews.text: The lamps are well made and well packed but the 'navy' lamps are cerulean blue at best in regard to color/darkness of blue. The color in the picture is not indicative of the actual blue color. We returned the lamps because of the inaccuracy.
customer_reviews.author: RMPrime

customer_reviews.title: Simply beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: These lamps are exactly what I needed for our nightstands. Every day my husband tells me how pretty they are!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Also the nice thing about buying the lamps was it came with ...
customer_reviews.text: Totally loving the lamps and loving the color blue. Only problem I had was that the shades came a little dented. Also the nice thing about buying the lamps was it came with light bulbs. (Don't mind the two different colors I was trying out which one I liked better)
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Just didn't like them
customer_reviews.text: They were as advertised and I really liked the color, but they just didn't look right. Seemed like they were too big at the top and too little at the bottom. Shades should have been tapered and maybe an off white color. I think that would have made them look better. I debated whether to buy new shades or just send them back. I opted to return them.
customer_reviews.author: MSM

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful lamps
customer_reviews.text: The shades on these lamps are gorgeous, as is the gray ceramic body. The material of the base of the lamp is plastic (not metal) as is the top Finial. So if that bugs you, don’t buy these lamps. They’re so beautiful I decided to “get over” the plastic parts and enjoy the sheer beauty of their asthetics.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp set
customer_reviews.text: Really like these lamps. Have been updating my living room with shades of blue and these lamps fit in perfectly. They look great. They were packaged so well that I was very grateful nothing was wrong with them because I never would have been able to re-package them to send them back. Color was true to the picture depicted on the site. Overall, felt this was a great purchase and would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: CSR

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful lamps and very well built
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful lamps and very well built. The price is very reasonable to boot! We ordered the grey glass color which was a bit lighter than I had imagined it being, almost ghostly to look through, but it fits in well in just about room do to the neutral coloration. The shades have a very soothing color as well and are well proportioned. I would definitely recommend these lamps.
customer_reviews.author: Eric N. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Couple quality issues but beautiful lamps
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with these lamps. One star deducted for an imperfection in the blue finish on one of the set. Returning seemed like too much of a hassle since they are larger and had a ton of packing styrofoam custom fit to the lamps. Also the shades were wrapped but both have creases that cannot be smoothed and bother me a little. Still I love the size, color, and style of these beautiful blue lamps. Overall happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Love the lamps
customer_reviews.text: The lamps are very good quality, my only disappointment is in the description it says they are tourquiose glass but they are more toward blue than the color shown and described. They are still a lovely addition to my living room.
customer_reviews.author: tinflorida2

customer_reviews.title: Classy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to use in my family room, that has a coastal decor. These lamps could be used with casual or more formally. They are lovely, the color is as shown, and they are quite substantial in size and width. They are easy to assemble and include a lightbulb for each lamp. They came packaged very well and had no damage.
customer_reviews.author: AKMacK

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: The color is beautiful and most lamps that have a cord through them the cord shows. This is inside a metal rod and is a good quality cord. You won't be disappointed with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Renwar

customer_reviews.title: Safavieh Smokey Grey glass lamps
customer_reviews.text: These are gorgeous lamps. Even prettier in person, large and bold, shipped quickly and packaged well, plus easy to assemble. The shades are true white and pop! So happy with them, may buy another set.
customer_reviews.author: Cheynannan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lighting
customer_reviews.text: Safavieh is a terrific brand and these lamps didn't disappoint me. They were packaged well and arrive promptly. They are beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: S. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I really love my new lamps
customer_reviews.text: I really love my new lamps. Arrived on time in perfect shape. Easy to put together. My husband even did it. No problem. Our bedroom looks great with our new lamps
customer_reviews.author: Yankee Girl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these lamps! They match my furniture so well!
customer_reviews.author: Paula J McLaren

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamps!
customer_reviews.text: Super well packed, nice quality and just as described. I would buy these lamps again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Harry E Seaman

customer_reviews.title: Best place for lamps.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THE LAMPS. They are exactly as shown on line. The package arrived on time. No breakage and easy to follow directions for assembly. The lamps are fir a remoldel project and are perfect. Will buy from you again. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Claire M. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful lamps. I was really surprised at the color and how much light they put out. I put these in my den and absolutely love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful lamps for the price. They look better than the picture shows them. Great for any room. I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: D.B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous and the exact color I was looking for. Well-packed and high quality lamps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The look of these are great. They came very securely packaged. Easy setup, beautiful design.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Paris

customer_reviews.title: Just beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: amazing shipping so secure and pack perfect! just screw the rod in and add the bulb which they included which was so nice! and the shade and Wow! The blue is so Pretty. They match perfect with the room I am doing for Blue Coral for our beach house. The glass is just I would just crystal blue LOL. Wish I could order in many colors.
customer_reviews.author: ROSANNE K STRITTMATTER

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These lamps make a statement in my bedroom. They are exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: MELISSA BRIGHTWELL

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made lamp and they do work well
customer_reviews.text: The reviews warned me that the blue wasn't a dark blue. They are a dark blue until the natural light shines on them. These wee too turquoise for my original intent but they worked well in a different room that had blue walls. Nicely made lamp and they do work well.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love!
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered these for my new apartment and absolutely love them! I've put them into our master bedroom and think they really help the room "pop".
customer_reviews.author: NEG64

product_meta.title: Safavieh Lighting Collection Grey Glass 28-inch Table Lamp (Set of 2)
product_meta.description: Color:GreyInspired by collectible colored glass vases and bottles, the clear grey glass table lamp is a perfect accessory for coastal and cottage style interiors. Silver fittings and off-white cotton hardback drum shade update the romantic vintage look.
feature_bullets: This lamp is crafted of glass
Perfect for a living room, bedroom, den, library, study or office
For over 100 years, Safavieh has been crafting products of the highest quality and unmatched style
To clean, wipe with a soft, dry cloth; Avoid the use of chemicals and household cleaners as they may damage the finish

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars125 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
